name: @aipt/iconfont
description: Iconfont utility library with Tailwind CSS support

scripts.build: tsc --build tsconfig.build.json && bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs
scripts.build:esm: bun build ./src/index.ts --format esm --target node --minify --external @aipt/* --external react --external react-dom --outfile ./dist/index.mjs
scripts.build:cjs: bun build ./src/index.ts --format cjs --target node --minify --external @aipt/* --external react --external react-dom --outfile ./dist/index.cjs
